#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t,n,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	int time[1000]={0};
	cin>>n;
	int arr1[n],arr2[n];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	cin>>arr1[i];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	cin>>arr2[i];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
	for(int j=arr1[i];j<arr2[i];j++)
		time[j]++;
	}
	int max=time[1];
	for(i=2;i<1000;i++)
	if(time[i]>max)
	max=time[i];
	
	cout<<max<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
